hero.name: mandeep
hero.description: full-stack developer focused on react, node.js, and web technologies. also building mobile apps with react native.
hero.workHistory: frontend engineer @ wireonelabs. ex software engineering intern @ thinkact.ai. ex full-stack developer @ vighnotech.

projects.title: WordSpace
projects.description: a full-stack MERN blog app where users can create, edit, and delete posts, with admin control over users, stats, and moderation.

projects.title: CEREBUS-AI-CyberShield
projects.description: an ai-powered malware detection system using static, dynamic, and hybrid analysis techniques, with comprehensive reporting.

projects.title: LinkUp
projects.description: a real-time chat app built with react native and powered by a node.js + express backend, leveraging socket.io for live messaging.

employment.description: Improved React Native app reliability by increasing test coverage from ~10% to ~70%. Refactored agriculture management dashboard using Nuxt.js, increasing test coverage to ~80% and building custom tables and forms. Integrated Grafana dashboards and contributed frontend features for enterprise applications.

Developed a flow-based agent orchestration platform using NestJS and React, building drag-and-drop agent builders and APIs. Implemented backend workflow logic for an internal CRM, building rules to track document validity and trigger verification workflows.

Worked on various projects involving React Native, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to build CRM systems, applications, and backend services. Focused on building and maintaining custom CRM systems and business automation tools for clients across multiple sectors.
Contributed to developing a CRM application using React Native during an internship. Gained practical experience building scalable mobile solutions and collaborating within a startup environment.
